oai_dc:dc.dc:title: False seedbeds in organic grown winter wheat
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Verschwele, Arnd
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
Weed management
Soil tillage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The false or stale seedbed technique is known as an effective tool of integrated weed control espe-cially in winter crops. However, only little data are available on the additional false seedbed effect compared to the only effect of late sowing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Verschwele, Arnd (2009) False seedbeds in organic grown winter wheat. In: Cloutier, Daniel C (Ed.) Proceedings 8th EWRS Workshop on Physical and Cultural Weed Control. Zaragoza, Spain. 9-11 March 2009. , p. 139.
